        <title><![CDATA[Restaurant Manager]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
 Based out of Central Florida, we are an award-winning family-oriented Smokehouse that continues to expand and grow. We are seeking a Manager candidate for our growing restaurant group. We have over 17 locations with plans to grow each year. We are seeking an outgoing, positive and culture focused individual. This position will begin in a MIT capacity. Our MIT Training program will lead to a Manager position upon your graduation. Future promotions within 4R are based upon many things including, but not limited to: Smokehouse needs, your performance, attitude, leadership, and business acumen.  
  

  
 
  

  
  What We Offer:  
  

  

  
+  An awesome work culture built on positive core values rooted in trust, uncompromised integrity, open communication, excellence, and respect. 
  

  
+  A work/life balance where we close by 9PM, are closed on Sundays, and closed on major holidays such as Thanksgiving, Christmas Day, and New Years Day. 
  

  
+  401(k) program and company match, Medical, Vision, and Dental coverage. 
  

  
+  A cell phone reimbursement plan, and a Health & Wellness Reimbursement program. 
  

  
+  Quarterly team building outings, Yearly company celebrations 
  

  
+  Community Serve Days, Volunteer Opportunities 
  

  
+  Leadership & Growth 
  

  

  
 
  

  
 Responsibilities and Duties: 
  

  

  
+  Drive accountability for delivery of revenue, growth, income, and profit goals. Monitor success of sales and operations regularly; work with Managers to set clear goals and objectives, and continually measure performance against plans and objectives. Make adjustments as needed to meet goals. 
  

  
+  Establish and maintain a level of credibility and trust that encourages team members at all levels to openly discuss issues. 
  

  
+  Recruit, hire, develop, and lead smokehouse Team Members. Set performance guidelines and communicate regularly regarding work responsibilities and performance. Coach, discipline, and/or terminate when necessary. 
  

  
+  Stay abreast of industry trends, local business issues, competitive challenges, and other relevant operational issues that may have a business impact. Anticipate, plan for, identify, and craft solutions to respond effectively to market demands and changes. 
  

  
+  Manage inventory and purchase equipment and supplies as needed. 
  

  
+  P&L, Financial oversight including but not limited to labor, food cost, waste, and R&M. 
  

  
+  Develop and grow positive relationships with team members to create an exceptional work environment and culture. 
  

  
+  Coach, manage and lead the management team to successful operation of the business and build talent bench strength. 
  

  

  
 
  

  
 Qualifications and Skills: 
  

  

  
+  Attention to detail & accuracy. 
  

  
+  Excellent organization, problem solving and time management skills. 
  

  
+  Outgoing, friendly, builds and maintains relationships with community and guests. 
  

  
+  Self-starter and takes initiative. 
  

  
+  Ability to start and complete projects in a timely and efficient manner. 
  

  
+  Excellent communicator (written and verbal). 
  

  
+  Ability to work well in a team environment. 
  

  
+  Results driven. 
  

  
+  Flexible availability. 
  

  
+  4-6 years of experience in the restaurant industry. 
  

  
+  Proven record of leadership and problem-solving ability in fast paced environment. 
  

  
+  Proficiency in Microsoft Office. 
  

  
+  Willingness to work nights and weekends when necessary. 
  

  
+  High school diploma or its equivalent is required. 
  

  

  
 
  

  
  At 4 Rivers, all talent is given equal opportunity | Drug Free Workplace | Background Checks Required

        <title><![CDATA[Line Cook/Prep Cook]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Do you have a passion for cooking? Join the 4 Rivers Family! Based out of Central Florida, we are an award-winning Smokehouse that continues to expand and grow. We specialize in smoked meats and savory homemade southern style sides, with influences from barbecue all over the country.
  

  
We pride ourselves in providing exceptional products, steadfast customer service, and uncompromised integrity. Our Chef and Owner John Rivers strives to support our local communities in everything we do. Just as our Smokehouse and the communities we serve continue to grow, we want you to grow with us!
  

  
Our core values ? servitude, integrity, faith, consistency, intentionality, exceptionality and creativity ? help separate us from our competitors, and by investing in the development of our people and promoting from within, we ensure they are instilled from the beginning.
  

  
We are looking for ambitious, friendly, service-minded people to fulfill all Cook positions including the following stations:
  

  

  
+ Middle Man
  

  
+ Sandwich/Fry
  

  
+ Hot and Cold Prep
  

  
+ Baker
  

  

  
Every position adds to the overall guest experience, we support creativity and intentionality. 4Rivers is a scratch kitchen, making fresh food daily. Some responsibilities include, but not limited to:
  

  

  
+ Prepare product/Menu items to recipe
  

  
+ Assist other team members with any prep/cleaning
  

  
+ Communicate with the Middle Line and FOH on food levels/completion
  

  
+ Uphold 4R standard and quality of food
  

  

  
Benefits of joining the 4R Family include:
  

  

  
+ Free employee meal for every shift and discounts at 4R locations
  

  
+ 401(k) program and match (eligible after one year with the company)
  

  
+ Quarterly team building outings and Yearly Company Celebrations
  

  
+ Community Serve Days, Volunteer Opportunities
  

  
+ NO LATE nights, SUNDAYS OFF & Flexible Schedule

        <title><![CDATA[Smokehouse Team Member]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Here at 4 Rivers Smokehouse we pride ourselves in providing exceptional products, steadfast customer service, and uncompromised integrity. Based out of Central Florida, we are an award-winning family-oriented Smokehouse that continues to expand and grow. We specialize in 18-hour Smoked Angus Brisket and savory homemade southern style sides, with influences from barbecue all over the country.
  

  
Our Chef and Owner John Rivers strives to support our local communities in everything we do. Just as our Smokehouse and the communities we serve continue to grow, we want you to grow with us!
  

  
 Benefits of joining the 4R Family include: 
  

  

  
+ Discounted meals at 4Rivers Smokehouse and The Coop & Free Employee Meal during your shift
  

  
+ 401(k) program and match (eligible after one year with the company)
  

  
+ Quarterly team outings, Yearly company celebrations!
  

  
+ Community Serve Days
  

  
+ Opportunities for Growth and Leadership
  

  
+ No late nights- close at 8pm on weekdays, 9pm on weekends
  

  
+ Flexible schedule, day shifts and night shifts available!
  

  

  
Every position contributes to the overall guest experience, we encourage creativity and intentionality! We are looking for team members who ensure positive guest experiences as they work efficiently with guests. Our Front of House Team is made up of the following positions: To-Gos, Dining Room and the Front Line.
  

  
 Some responsibilities include: 
  

  

  
+ Take orders and great guests in an upbeat, friendly attitude
  

  
+ Help guests with your menu knowledge to give recommendations and communicating with the Line future orders coming their way
  

  
+ Maintaining cleanliness of all facilities, drink stations, tables and floors
  

  
+ Helping guests carry trays to their seats, refilling their drinks, overall keeping them satisfied throughout their dining experience
  

  
+ Use creativity and intentionality to create special moments for our guests
  

  
+ Assisting other team members in any prep work that needs to be completed
  

  
+ Handling cash/card transactions, as well as 3rd party vendors (DoorDash, UberEats,etc)
  

  
+ Uphold 4R standards, values and dress code
